text: chaur anak pol tha tae anaknea ban hamkhat puok anak nouv saamliekbampeak saat ning leaphosakkar del la del a l laoh ban phdal aoy banda khnhom robsa trong noh? chaur anak pol tha vea ku samreab banda anak del mean chomnue knong karorsanow leu lokey nih cheapisesa ku ( samreab puokke) now thngai barlok . dauchnaoh der yeung banhcheak ph so d tang cheachraen( chbab ai sla m) yeang chbasa samreab krom del chehdoeng
